page.title: 05A DEVIZES RECTOR.
page.content: A typical week of a Devizes Rector. Reverend Bryant is the Rector of St. Mary's Church and St.John's Church. Both of these churches were built by Bishop Roger in the Twelth Century. Every morning at 7.45, Reverend Bryant says Matins and rings the bell. On Sunday he directs the services _ three at St. John's and two at St. Mary's. Occasionally on Sunday afternoons he preaches at old people's homes. During week_day mornings he prepares services, arranges the Church diary with weddings,funerals,christenings, concerts and special services. In the afternoon he visits people who are ill and attends meetings dealing with the towns' social events. He also talks to the bereaved, engaged couples or people in need. Thursday is his day off.
